I'm Josh Martin

About

I am a Designer, Illustrator, and Front-End Developer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania living in Chicago, Illinois. I currently work as an independent product designer, focusing on web/app UI/UX and creative direction.

In my free time, I work on variety of side projects that reflect a number of personal interests. Feel free to check them out: Brood, Reveew, Alleyooop, Bbbench.

I have a storefront to buy digital resources. I hope to open one for prints soon.

Portfolio: Behance
Skills/Experience: View CV
Contact: hellojoshmartin@gmail.com
Follow: Twitter, Dribbble, Instagram
